types.name: Query
types.description: Queries are data reads/filters on the API.

fields.name: productCategories
fields.description: it will return the product categories based on the carrierId and planId

fields.name: products
fields.description: Product listing query. Supports cursor-based pagination.

fields.name: search
fields.description: Product listing query. Supports cursor-based pagination.

fields.name: searchMetadata
fields.description: Product listing query. Supports cursor-based pagination.

fields.name: product
fields.description: Retrieve product details by its ID.

fields.name: suggestedProducts
fields.description: Return suggested products, filtered based on popularity, recommendations & purchase history.

fields.name: banners
fields.description: it will return the promotional banners based on the carrierId and planId

fields.name: productEligibility
fields.description: Check members retail product eligibility. Also used by barcode scanning.

fields.name: carrier
fields.description: Get Nations Benefits carrier configuration based on the subdomain or carrierId and planId

fields.name: applicationSettings
fields.description: Get Nations Benefits Phone Number & tty with Nations LOGO URL

fields.name: member
fields.description: Get Nations Benefits member data for specific member with respect to carrierId and planId

fields.name: benefits
fields.description: Get member's Benefit, Wallet and Card Details data for specific member with respect to carrierId and planId

fields.name: validateAddress
fields.description: validate address and provide a suggested alternative,if possible

fields.name: productPrices
fields.description: Retrieve product prices for provided wallet codes.

fields.name: productCatalogBrochures
fields.description:
Retrieve a list of product catalog brochures, by default filtered by member's carrier & plan data.
Additionally it's possible to filter by explicit language.

args.name: carrierId
args.description: Carrier ID, if used pre-authentication.

args.name: planId
args.description: Plan ID, if used pre-authentication.

args.name: language
args.description: Language code (ISO 639-1) to filter catalogs by

fields.name: orders
fields.description: Get a list of members orders.

args.name: id
args.description: Order ID

fields.name: nearbyStores
fields.description: Find stores near a given location. Returned data must be stored by distance, ascending.

args.name: input
args.description: Filtering parameters.

fields.name: transactionStatement
fields.description: Gets URL for authenticated member transactions statement in PDF format.

args.name: input
args.description: Filtering parameters.

fields.name: healthConditions
fields.description: List of all possible health conditions for selection on the personal health profile.

fields.name: validateMemberForRegistration
fields.description: Validate member data against elgiibility file. Used during registration.

fields.name: findMemberCarrier
fields.description: Finds a carrier ID for a member given various member details.

args.name: input
args.description: The members ID. This is explicitly member ID. Deprecated in favour of 'identifier'.

fields.name: validateMemberCredentials
fields.description: Validates the members credentials and returns information on the member.

fields.name: validateMemberMfa
fields.description: Validates the members MFA and returns if check was successful

fields.name: validateOtpCodeForVerification
fields.description: Validate OTP code for verification purposes, when the member email or phone no. are being set.

fields.name: mfaStatus
fields.description: Gets MFA status for a member.

args.name: carrierId
args.description: ID of the carrier the account is attached to.

args.name: nhMemberId
args.description: Nations ID of the member

args.name: carrierId
args.description: ID of the carrier the account is attached to.

args.name: nhMemberId
args.description: Nations ID of the member

args.name: mfaType
args.description: MFA type to retrieve details for.

fields.name: findMember
fields.description: Find member data based on provided inputs.

args.name: input
args.description: Filter parameters for user accounts

fields.name: securityQuestions
fields.description: Gets a list of possible security questions to be selected for MFA.

types.name: ShoppingCart
types.description: A member's current shopping cart.

fields.name: summary
fields.description:
Summary of total items on cart. NB API will not provide this, added via Federation service.
Just to let you know, asking for a summary will automatically call the benefits query behind the scenes.

fields.name: totalValue
fields.description: Total value of items on cart. NB API will not provide this, added via Federation service.

fields.name: totalCoveredValue
fields.description: Total value of items in cart covered by benefits. NB API will not provide this, added via Federation service.

fields.name: totalOutOfPocketValue
fields.description: Value that requires out-of-pocket payment. NB API will not provide this, added via Federation service.

fields.name: walletSummary
fields.description: Wallet summary taking into account items in cart.

fields.name: useRewards
fields.description: Global shopping cart rewards state. If this is True - prioritize deducting from reward funds.

types.name: ShoppingCartItem
types.description: A shopping cart item.

fields.name: walletCode
fields.description: Wallet selected to use funds for payment of the product.

types.name: Product
types.description: A product on the catalog of a plan.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique ID of the product (Nations ID).

fields.name: requiresCareManagerApproval
fields.description: Flag for care manager approval requirement.

fields.name: walletCodes
fields.description: Codes of the wallets that can be used to purchase the product.

fields.name: variants
fields.description: Product variations of any kind. All products will have at least 1 variant.

args.name: size
args.description: Size of the image. If not provided, the original image will be returned.

types.name: Node
types.description: Represents a node object a uniquely identifiable ID.

types.name: ID
types.description: The `ID` scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable. When expected as an input type, any string (such as `"4"`) or integer (such as `4`) input value will be accepted as an ID.

types.name: String
types.description: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The `Boolean` scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

types.name: ProductCategory
types.description: A Product category groups similar products.

fields.name: thumbnailUrl
fields.description: URL of the category thumbnail image.

types.name: ProductAttribute
types.description: A generic product attribute. Could be used for extra information about the product (e.g.: dimensions, colors).

types.name: ProductVariant
types.description: A product variation. Maybe used for products with different colors, sizes, count, etc.

fields.name: itemCode
fields.description: Unique item code per product variant.

fields.name: inStock
fields.description: Flag to determine if the product is in stock or not.

fields.name: thumbnail
fields.description: URL for the product variant thumbnail to be shown on list view.

fields.name: images360
fields.description: Product variant images for the 360 view.

types.name: Decimal
types.description: Fixed precision (up to 2 decimal places) numeric value.

types.name: ProductInStock
types.description: Defines whether a product is in stock, not it stock, or stok information is not known.

types.name: Image
types.description: Image object.

types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: DateTime
types.description: An `Datetime` scalar is ISO-8601 encoded UTC date string like `2022-10-01T00:00:00Z`.

types.name: ShoppingCartSummary
types.description: Aggregation of total value of items on cart and wallet usage.

fields.name: totalValue
fields.description: Total value of items on cart. NB API will not provide this, added via Federation service.

fields.name: totalCoveredValue
fields.description: Total value of items in cart covered by benefits. NB API will not provide this, added via Federation service.

fields.name: totalOutOfPocketValue
fields.description: Value that requires out-of-pocket payment. NB API will not provide this, added via Federation service.

fields.name: walletSummary
fields.description: Wallet summary taking into account items in cart.

types.name: WalletSummary
types.description: Represents the value of a wallet, considering items in the cart.

fields.name: isBenefitCardWallet
fields.description: Identifies whether the wallet is from a benefit card.

fields.name: appliedToCart
fields.description: Is the wallet applied to cart.

fields.name: totalValue
fields.description: Total value of items in cart for this particular wallet.

fields.name: coveredValue
fields.description: Amount of total value covered by the wallet. Amounts to total value or current balance of the wallet, whichever is less.

fields.name: remainingValue
fields.description: Remaining value of the benefit balance after deduction of the value covered by wallet.

fields.name: outOfPocketValue
fields.description: Out of pocket payment value for wallet.

types.name: Wallet
types.description: A member's benefit wallet. Used to purchase products on the OTC portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique ID of the wallet. For caching only. Use walletCode for any transactions.

fields.name: walletCode
fields.description: Wallet code - uniquely identifies a wallet. walletCode should be used over ID.

fields.name: icon
fields.description: Wallet's icon to show to member

fields.name: currentBalance
fields.description: Numeric value for the balance initially loaded

fields.name: initialBalance
fields.description: Numeric value for the current balance

fields.name: expiryDate
fields.description: Expiration date of the wallet. ISO date.

fields.name: renewDate
fields.description: Renewal date of the wallet. ISO date.

fields.name: balanceType
fields.description: Measurement units for the balance (Amount in Cents, Count)

fields.name: walletIssuer
fields.description: Provider of the wallet balance. Similar to card issuer.

fields.name: isRewardWallet
fields.description: Flag to determine if this is a reward wallet.

fields.name: side
fields.description: For HA benefit only. Defines which ear the wallet can be used for.

fields.name: walletUsage
fields.description: Wallet usable within online/offline/both stores and environments.

types.name: WalletBalanceType
types.description: Type of a wallet. To determine the difference between a monetary and an item wallet.

types.name: WalletIssuer
types.description: Issuer of wallet balance.

types.name: PerTypeSide
types.description: Side definition of the 'per' type of HA benefit. Can be used for the left, right or both ears (if per type is COMBINED).

types.name: ShoppingCartReward
types.description: Reward fund available and used on shopping cart.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: Reward amount that has been applied to cart. If not applied - set to 0.

types.name: Reward
types.description: Benefit rewards fund.

fields.name: displayName
fields.description: Display name of the reward fund.

fields.name: walletCodes
fields.description: Wallets this reward is applicable to.

types.name: ProductSortInput
types.description: Product sort input.

types.name: ProductSortBy
types.description: Product sort by values

types.name: SortDirection
types.description: A The product on the catalog of a plan.

types.name: ProductFilterInput
types.description: Represents a basic page info object.

inputFields.name: query
inputFields.description: Free text query to match products against. Currently matches name, item code & category.

inputFields.name: walletCodes
inputFields.description: Filter products by applicable wallets.Use wallet code instead wallet ID for filtering.

types.name: FilteredProductConnection
types.description: Result of product filtering.

fields.name: pageInfo
fields.description: Flag to determine whether more products can be fetched.

fields.name: filters
fields.description: Aggregations on current results to be used for further filtering

types.name: ProductEdge
types.description: Product Edge object. Contains the product node & its cursor.

fields.name: cursor
fields.description: The cursor of the current edge.

types.name: PageInfo
types.description: Represents a basic page info object.

fields.name: hasNextPage
fields.description: Flag to determine whether more data can be fetched.

fields.name: endCursor
fields.description: Cursor to be used for fetching the next page.

types.name: ProductFilterAggregate
types.description: An aggregation of product data to be used for filtering.

fields.name: priceMin
fields.description: Minimum Price of the Product Variant

fields.name: priceMax
fields.description: Maximum Price of the Product Variant

types.name: ProductFilter
types.description: A title-count pair for product aggretates used for filtering.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Filter identifier, used as value to filter products further

fields.name: count
fields.description: Number of products on the result for the aggregate item

types.name: SearchData
types.description: Search data type. Contains autocomplete strings, to be used for product search, as well as product suggestions.

fields.name: productAutoSuggestions
fields.description: Free text autocomplete suggestions. These should be used as `query` filter parameter within `products` query.

types.name: SearchMetadata
types.description: Search metadata type.

fields.name: popularSearches
fields.description: A list of popular search phrases.

types.name: SuggestedProductsFilterInput
types.description: Suggested products filter.

inputFields.name: walletCodes
inputFields.description: Wallets that can be used to purchase the product.

types.name: SuggestedProductsType
types.description: An enumeration of possible suggested product types.

types.name: ProductConnection
types.description: Product response with cursor pagination.

fields.name: pageInfo
fields.description: Flag to determine whether more products can be fetched.

types.name: CardReplacementReason
types.description: An enumeration of possible card replacement reasons.

types.name: TransactionsInput
types.description: Parameters for filtering transactions.

inputFields.name: startDate
inputFields.description: Start date for the transactions filter

inputFields.name: endDate
inputFields.description: End date for the transactions filter

types.name: Date
types.description: A `Date` scalar is ISO-8601 encoded date string like `2022-10-01`.

types.name: NonMonetaryTransaction
types.description: A non-financial transaction/event on which the member was involved.

types.name: TransactionsPayload
types.description: Transactions query response payload.

fields.name: filters
fields.description: Summary of wallets and types for front-end filtering of the results.

types.name: Transaction
types.description: A financial (cash-in/cash-out) transaction on which the member was involved. Could be a benefit recharge (cash-in), card swipe (cash-out), OTC purchase (cash-out), etc.

types.name: TransactionStatus
types.description: An enumeration of possible transaction statuses.

types.name: TransactionFilterAggregate
types.description: Summary of wallets and types for a list of transactions.

fields.name: wallets
fields.description: List of all unique wallets used on the transactions.

fields.name: types
fields.description: List of all unique transaction types on the transactions/

types.name: TransactionFilter
types.description: Transactions filter type.

types.name: PromotionalBanner
types.description: A banner to be shown to the member. Used for promotional communication.

types.name: Retailer
types.description: A retailer chain that sells eligible products.

types.name: ProductEligibility
types.description: Product eligibility data model.

fields.name: isEligible
fields.description: Flag to determine whether the product is eligible for purchase.

fields.name: walletCode
fields.description: Wallet code that the product is tied to.

fields.name: image
fields.description: Product image. Front-ends should handle fallback to local placeholders.

types.name: Carrier
types.description: Get all Configurations for Insurance Carrier

fields.name: allowsRegistration
fields.description: User Need to register or not

fields.name: loginMessage
fields.description: Promotional message to be displayed on the landing page for unauthenticated users

fields.name: personalHealthProfileEnabled
fields.description: Does carrier have Personal Health Profile enabled

fields.name: loginTemplate
fields.description: The template for carrier specific login fields

fields.name: rewardsPdfUrl
fields.description: CDN URL of the rewards PDF, if applicable to the carrier.

types.name: LoginTemplate
types.description: An enumeration of possible login templates (combination of fieds)

types.name: ApplicationSettings
types.description: Applications setting for nations benefits

fields.name: androidAppUrl
fields.description: URL for NationsBenefits Android app on Play Store

fields.name: iosAppUrl
fields.description: URL for NationsBenefits iOS app on App Store

types.name: Member
types.description: A member is the insured person, who has access to the card and wallets to buy products.

fields.name: nhMemberId
fields.description: Unique ID of the member account

fields.name: carrierId
fields.description: ID of the carrier the member belongs to

fields.name: planId
fields.description: ID of the plan the member belongs to

fields.name: addresses
fields.description: Member's mailing address, also used for shipping

fields.name: ssbciOsbFitting
fields.description: Is the member fitted on SSBCI/OSB

fields.name: groceryOptIn
fields.description: Has the member opted-in for grocery benefit

fields.name: hasSelectedHealthConditions
fields.description: Determine whether the member has selected personalized health conditions

types.name: Address
types.description: Member address information.

fields.name: firstName
fields.description: First name of the person at address

fields.name: lastName
fields.description: Last name of the person at address

fields.name: isPreferredAddress
fields.description: For determining if this is the mebmer's preferred address

types.name: MemberPreferences
types.description: Preferences for the member. Used for app settings and notification preferences. All fields are optional.

types.name: Language
types.description: An enumeration of possible UI languages.

types.name: Benefit
types.description: OTC benefit. Allows members to purchase for health products online or on retail stores.

fields.name: benefitType
fields.description: Type of the benefit - HA, OTC, PERS, MEALS

fields.name: benefitPerType
fields.description: Hearing Aids Combined or Left/Right Ear

fields.name: wallets
fields.description: List of wallets for the benefit

types.name: Card
types.description: Member's flex card information. Used to purchase products outside the OTC portal.

fields.name: issuer
fields.description: Card's issuer, e.g. FIS (Flex card provider), WEX. Helpful during checkout.

fields.name: last4
fields.description: Last 4 digits of the card no.

fields.name: wallets
fields.description: List of wallets attached to the card

fields.name: image
fields.description: Card image visuals. Not all carriers may provide this, front-ends should implement a fallback image

types.name: CardNetwork
types.description: An enumeration of possible card networks.

types.name: CardIssuer
types.description: Issuer for a card. Usually a bank or fintech (FIS, WEX, etc.).

types.name: CardStatus
types.description: And enumeration of possible card statuses.

types.name: BenefitPerType
types.description: "Per" type of the benefit wallet. Currently only used for HA wallets - COMBINED or PER_EAR.

types.name: ValidateAddressInput
types.description: Address format for address validation query input.

types.name: ValidatedAddress
types.description: Validate address and provide a suggested alternative, if possible.

types.name: ProductPrice
types.description: Product price type, per specific wallet code.

fields.name: walletCode
fields.description: Wallet code the price refers to.

types.name: ProductCatalogBrochure
types.description:
A catalog's brochure of products covered by carrier and plan. It can be available in many languages.
E.g. an English version of the OTC catalog.

fields.name: downloadUrl
fields.description: URL where a PDF version of the brochure can be found.

types.name: Order
types.description: An order made by a member.

fields.name: createdDate
fields.description: Date the order was created - UTC timestamp.

fields.name: orderUpdatesEmail
fields.description: Email address to receive updates on order.

fields.name: orderUpdatesPhone
fields.description: Phone number to receive SMS updates on the order.

types.name: OrderStatus
types.description: An enumeration of possible order statuses, in sequence.

types.name: OrderItem
types.description: A product ordered by a member.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the order item.

fields.name: productVariant
fields.description: Specific product variant that was ordered.
fields.deprecationReason: This is to be removed, please use variant prop on product

fields.name: unitPrice
fields.description: Unit price of the order item.

fields.name: totalPrice
fields.description: Total price of the ordered item, based on unit price and quantity.

fields.name: walletCode
fields.description: Code of the wallet used to pay for the product.

types.name: OrderWalletValue
types.description: Wallet balances used to cover an order.

fields.name: walletCode
fields.description: Unique code of the wallet used.

types.name: OrderRewardValue

types.name: ShippingAddress

Filter for searching nearby stores.
The API validates that either zip or latitude/longitude is provided.

types.name: Store

fields.name: walletCodes

types.name: Mutation
types.description: Mutations are the operations/use-cases over the API data.

fields.name: clearShoppingCart
fields.description: Remove all items from shopping cart, including applied rewards.

fields.name: updateMemberHealthConditions
fields.description: Updates the members personal health profile - health conditions.

args.name: input
args.description: List of members health conditions.

fields.name: orderPaperCatalog
fields.description: Asks for a paper product catalog delivery.

fields.name: emailCatalog
fields.description: Email a digital version of the product catalog.

fields.name: updateShoppingCartUseRewardsState
fields.description:
Update shopping cart state for whether to prioritize deducting reward funds or not.
See `useRewards` property on `ShoppingCart` type.

fields.name: updateShoppingCartReward
fields.description: Update shopping cart rewards data to identify which rewards should be used.

args.name: input
args.description: Rewards data to be updated on cart.

args.name: input
args.description: Card activation input data.

fields.name: replaceCard
fields.description:
Asks for a card replacement for authenticated member.
Usable only for the following card statuses - READY, ACTIVE, LOST.

args.name: input
args.description: Info required for asking a card replacement.

fields.name: checkout
fields.description:
"
Creates new pending orders and empties the cart.

args.name: input
args.description: Order data required for checkout.

fields.name: cancelOrder
fields.description: Asks for a order or order item cancellation (only if status < shipped)

args.name: input
args.description: Info on the cancellation being asked

fields.name: requestOtpCode
fields.description: Requests an OTP code to be sent to the member.

args.name: carrierId
args.description: ID of the carrier the account is attached to.

args.name: nhMemberId
args.description: Nations ID of the member.

args.name: mfaType
args.description: OTP method selected. SECURITY_QUESTIONS are not support in this scenario.

fields.name: requestOtpCodeForVerification
fields.description:
Requests an OTP code to be sent to a member for verification purposes.
Unlike `requestOtpCode`, this method allows providing email address or phone number manually.

args.name: carrierId
args.description: ID of the carrier the account is attached to.

args.name: mfaType
args.description: OTP method selected. SECURITY_QUESTIONS are not support in this scenario.

args.name: contact
args.description: Email address or phone number, based on mfaType.

fields.name: resetPassword
fields.description: Resets the password for a member (after MFA check).

args.name: carrierId
args.description: ID of the carrier the account is attached to.

args.name: memberId
args.description: ID of the member

args.name: newPassword
args.description: New password for the  member

fields.name: changePassword
fields.description: Changes the password for the authenticated member.

fields.name: registerMember
fields.description: Registers a new member on the application.

types.name: ShoppingCartItemUpdateInput
types.description: Product data to be updated on members shopping cart.

inputFields.name: quantity
inputFields.description: Item quantity. If quantity is 0 - the item will be removed.

inputFields.name: unitPrice
inputFields.description: Price of the product at the time of adding to cart.

inputFields.name: walletCode
inputFields.description: Wallet to be used for purchasing the specific item.

types.name: UpdateShoppingCartItemPayload
types.description: Response payload for updating shopping cart item.

fields.name: item
fields.description: Product that was updated on cart.

fields.name: walletFundsAvailable
fields.description: If after adding an item to cart, the wallet still has a remaining amount - return True, otherwise return False.

fields.name: rewardFundsAvailable
fields.description:
If the member has rewards, and after adding an item to cart, the rewards fund still has a remaining amount - return True, otherwise return False.
If the member does not have rewards - return False.

types.name: UpdateMemberHealthConditionsInput
types.description: Input object for updating member health conditions - use health condition name as "key" value.

types.name: AddressInput
types.description: Address data to be updated.

inputFields.name: firstName
inputFields.description: First name of the person at address

inputFields.name: lastName
inputFields.description: Last name of the person at address

inputFields.name: isPreferredAddress
inputFields.description: Flag to determine whether the address should be set as preferred address

types.name: PaperCatalogOrderInput
types.description: Data on a paper product catalog's delivery order.

inputFields.name: brochureIds
inputFields.description: Brochure IDs to include on the order

types.name: ShippingAddressInput
types.description: Shipping address input type.

types.name: EmailCatalogInput
types.description: Email product catalog input.

types.name: ShoppingCartRewardUpdateInput
types.description: Reward data to be updated on members shopping cart.

inputFields.name: amount
inputFields.description: Amount to be used. Set 0 to remove reward from cart.

types.name: UpdateShoppingCartRewardPayload
types.description: Response payload for updating shopping cart reward.

fields.name: rewards
fields.description: Reward that was updated on cart.

types.name: ActivateCardInput
types.description: Card info required to activate a card. Carrier ID & plan ID to be used from the JWT token when possible.

inputFields.name: cardNumber
inputFields.description:
The value of this property depends on whether this query is made by an authenicated or an unauthenticated user.
Last 4 digits of the card number should be passed for authenticated users.
Full 16 digit card number should be passed for non-authenticated user.

inputFields.name: cardIssuer
inputFields.description: For future additions, support card issuer. Currently only for Flex cards.

inputFields.name: carrierId
inputFields.description: Carrier the card activation is for.

types.name: CardWithoutWallets
types.description: Member's flex card information, excluding wallets. Used for card activation.

fields.name: issuer
fields.description: Card issuer, e.g. FIS (Flex card provider), WEX. Helpful during checkout.

fields.name: last4
fields.description: Last 4 digits of the card number.

fields.name: image
fields.description: Card image visuals. Not all carriers may provide this, front-ends should implement a fallback image.

types.name: ReplaceCardInput
types.description: Data on a members card replacement.

inputFields.name: reasonCode
inputFields.description: Code for replacement reason. 'reasonCode' value from Reason object.

inputFields.name: reason
inputFields.description: Replacement reason. 'reason' value from Reason object.

types.name: CardReplacement
types.description: Member card replacement event data.

types.name: CheckoutInput
types.description:
Data required to complete a shopping cart checkout.
TODO: How to handle V2 benefit cards, that do not require card details input?
      Waiting on clarification from NB.

inputFields.name: items
inputFields.description: Items to be included in checkout.

inputFields.name: payments
inputFields.description: List of payments to cover the order.

inputFields.name: totalOutOfPocketValue
inputFields.description: Total out of pocket value of the order, that the member covers via a credit/debit card.

inputFields.name: orderUpdatesEmail
inputFields.description: Email address to receive updates on order.

inputFields.name: orderUpdatesPhone
inputFields.description: Phone number to receive SMS updates on the order.

inputFields.name: careManagerApprovalCode
inputFields.description: Care manager approval code, in case an item that requires one is being purchased.

types.name: OrderItemInput
types.description: Input object for an order item.

inputFields.name: quantity
inputFields.description: Quantity of the product to be purchased.

inputFields.name: walletCode
inputFields.description: Wallet code to be used for purchasing the specific item.

types.name: PaymentInput
types.description: Data on a payment used to cover an order.

inputFields.name: cardPayment
inputFields.description: Credit card info, if own pocket method is used.

types.name: PaymentMethod
types.description: An enumeration of possible order payment methods.

types.name: CardPaymentInput
types.description: Data for credit/debit card payment

types.name: RewardInput
types.description: Rewards data used for checkout.

inputFields.name: rewardCode
inputFields.description: Unique code of the reward fund.

inputFields.name: usedAmount
inputFields.description: Amount to be used from rewards fund.

types.name: CheckoutWalletInput
types.description: Wallet data input for checkout.

types.name: CancelOrderInput
types.description: Order cancelation data required.

inputFields.name: orderId
inputFields.description: ID of the order being cancelled.

types.name: ChangePasswordInput
types.description: Data for changing a member's password.

types.name: UpdateMemberProfileInput
types.description: Member profile data to be updated. Null fields won't be updated.

inputFields.name: emailAddress
inputFields.description: Members email address, used for contacting the member and for receiving OTP codes for carriers that support MFA.

inputFields.name: phoneNumber
inputFields.description: Members phone number, used for contacting the member and for receiving OTP codes for carriers that support MFA.

types.name: RegisterMemberInput
types.description: Member data required for registration.

inputFields.name: emailAddress
inputFields.description: Members email address, used for contacting the member and for receiving OTP codes for MFA

inputFields.name: emailVerified
inputFields.description: Flag to determine whether the email address has been verified with an OTP

inputFields.name: phoneNumber
inputFields.description: Members phone number, used for contacting the member and for receiving OTP codes for MFA

inputFields.name: phoneNumberVerified
inputFields.description: Flag to determine whether the phone number has been verified with an OTP

inputFields.name: securityQuestions
inputFields.description: List of security questions (if not using OTP MFA)

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Schema defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, as well as the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: A list of all directives supported by this server.

types.name: __Type
types.description:
The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the `__TypeKind` enum.

Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name and description, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given `__Type` is.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields` and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

types.name: __Field
types.description: Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: A GraphQL-formatted string representing the default value for this input value.

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.

types.name: __Directive
types.description:
A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.

In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQL's execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a query operation.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a mutation operation.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a subscription operation.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment definition.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment spread.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an inline fragment.

enumValues.name: VARIABLE_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a variable definition.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a schema definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a scalar definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an object type definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an argument definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an interface definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a union definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum value definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object type definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object field definition.

args.name: input
args.description: Filtering parameters.

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true.

args.name: if
args.description: Included when true.

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if` argument is true.

args.name: if
args.description: Skipped when true.

directives.name: deprecated
directives.description: Marks an element of a GraphQL schema as no longer supported.

args.name: reason
args.description: Explains why this element was deprecated, usually also including a suggestion for how to access supported similar data. Formatted using the Markdown syntax, as specified by [CommonMark](https://commonmark.org/).

directives.name: specifiedBy
directives.description: Exposes a URL that specifies the behavior of this scalar.

args.name: url
args.description: The URL that specifies the behavior of this scalar.

directives.name: defer
directives.description: The `@defer` directive may be provided for fragment spreads and inline fragments to inform the executor to delay the execution of the current fragment to indicate deprioritization of the current fragment. A query with `@defer` directive will cause the request to potentially return multiple responses, where non-deferred data is delivered in the initial response and data deferred is delivered in a subsequent response. `@include` and `@skip` take precedence over `@defer`.

args.name: label
args.description: If this argument label has a value other than null, it will be passed on to the result of this defer directive. This label is intended to give client applications a way to identify to which fragment a deferred result belongs to.

args.name: if
args.description: Deferred when true.

directives.name: stream
directives.description: The `@stream` directive may be provided for a field of `List` type so that the backend can leverage technology such as asynchronous iterators to provide a partial list in the initial response, and additional list items in subsequent responses. `@include` and `@skip` take precedence over `@stream`.

args.name: label
args.description: If this argument label has a value other than null, it will be passed on to the result of this stream directive. This label is intended to give client applications a way to identify to which fragment a streamed result belongs to.

args.name: initialCount
args.description: The initial elements that shall be send down to the consumer.

args.name: if
args.description: Streamed when true.

directives.name: preview
directives.description: Preview directive - hides annotated queries, mutations, types, etc. unless preview mode is enabled
